recommendations.recommendation: Consider using spot instances or reserved instances to save up to 80% on EC2 instances in AWS, Azure or GCP.
Use autoscaling and right-size instances based on workload to avoid overprovisioning in all cloud providers.
Optimize database queries and indexing to reduce the number of read and write operations.
Consider using open-source databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL or MongoDB for free-tier or lower-cost options.
Use tiered storage or archive infrequent data to reduce storage costs.
Use Elastic IPs or static IPs only when necessary to save on data transfer costs.
Consider using open-source monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana or Nagios for free or lower-cost alternatives.
Implement infrastructure as code using Terraform, CloudFormation or Azure Resource Manager to ensure efficient resource utilization and avoid manual errors.
